name: NO-VAC
description:
NO-VAC (Survive From Failure Pulls) Have you ever had a failure in your life? Failure will always drag us down. But Dont Worry About It . Keep moving towards the small opportunities that are in front of you. GAME INSTRUCTIONS: • Try to Survive As Much As You Can: • Move The Cursor To Other Objects And Press Left Click: • Press Space To Activate Shield: CHARACTERS & UPGRADES

• Unlock All Characters !!!

• SPEED   : To Move Super Fast!!!

• SHIELD  : To Increase Shield Time!!!

SUPPORT ME ❤

•YOUTUBE (SUBSCRIBE)

•INSTAGRAM (FOLLOW)

A GAME BY ALN THE MIGHTY GAMEDEV ⚔
